summary: The SkyFoundry Act of 2025 mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish and maintain a program focused on the rapid development, testing, and mass production of small unmanned aircraft systems (drones). The program, administered by the Army, will utilize a government-owned innovation facility and production facility, leverage alternative acquisition methods, and consider public-private partnerships. The bill also includes provisions for intellectual property rights, Defense Production Act designation to support domestic production, and expedited approvals. The bill aims to enhance the U.S.'s capabilities in this area and ensure national defense.
